v0.2.0
======

:date: 2024-03-20 (JST)

Breaking changes
----------------

* Set ``hx-boost`` internal ``a`` elements instead of ``body``.

  * It will disable boost works for ``form`` elements.

Features
--------

* Add ``htmx_boost_preload`` option to enable htmx-extension.

Miscellaneous
-------------

* Update local development environment.
